results.content: Excellent! Covers several plugins for different proposes.
results.content_html: Excellent! Covers several plugins for different proposes.

results.content:
I am halfway through to this course. Jonas introduces some cool plugins (both premium and free), which works seamlessly out of the box. The instructor is engaging, show new tips and tricks on how to work with this plugins.
Thank you.
